name: Oopie's Great Heist
description:
Stealth game where you're stealing trees.

Made for Kenney Jam 2022.

Controls: (included in the game)

  •  controller Y/X or space to jump
  • a/d or arrow keys or dpad to move left and right
  • w/s or arrow keys or dpad to ascent or descend
  • e/x or controller X/Y to mark trees for extraction

Note: on an azerty keyboard, it will still work as you expect it, the controls map to the physical location of the keys on a qwerty keyboard not the letters themselves.

Controllers are NOT tested, but should work.

source: https://github.com/Frontrider/Oopie-s-Great-Heist
